snippet: A string of orchestrated explosions rocked southern Thailand over the weekend, killing 14 people, injuring hundreds and raising fears of larger and deadlier bombs being used by suspected Muslim insurgents.
abstract: A string of orchestrated explosions rocked southern Thailand over the weekend, killing 14 people, injuring hundreds and raising fears of larger and deadlier bombs being used by suspected Muslim insurgents.

headline.main: Insurgents' Bombs in Thailand: Bigger and Deadlier
